properties.Name: Gosport Riot
properties.Agents: Captain Thomas Griffin, the St. George, Portsmouth harbour. Thomas Graham, a member of his crew, was put on board a ship bound for Cowes in place of a man who was impressed out of her last March. When he returned to duty he was involved in the Gosport riot 'being in liquor' and sent to Winchester gaol for 10 months. He asks for the R, which was placed on him, to be removed. Enclosed in f102.
properties.Label: Gosport, England

properties.Name: Riot
properties.Agents: reports by victualler, constable and surgeon on riot causes by Irishman trying to get drunk at 'Cock', Walthamstow when it was closing and breaking of windows and severe wounding of landlord
properties.Label: Walthamstow
